textAfterTable: Advertising & Marketing  Burt's Bees makes Carly Rae Jepsen the first spokeswoman of gud Gud, a brand of personal care products from Burt's Bees marketed to the 20-something crowd, has named pop singer Carly Rae Jepsen as the brand's first spokeswoman, appearing in multimedia ads this spring. "Carly's vibrant spirit and genuine talent are inspirational to the gud consumer. She models a way of life reflective of gud's cheerful personality and real substance," said Nick Vlahos, Burt's Bees vice president and general manager.
